statements: SELECT * FROM HeatMapData ORDER BY region_id DESC;
SELECT region_name, population_density FROM HeatMapData WHERE crime_rate > 50;
SELECT * FROM HeatMapData WHERE population_density BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY population_density ASC;
SELECT region_name, crime_rate FROM HeatMapData WHERE population_density < 200;
SELECT AVG(crime_rate) AS average_crime_rate FROM HeatMapData;
SELECT region_name, population_density FROM HeatMapData ORDER BY region_name DESC;
SELECT region_name, crime_rate FROM HeatMapData WHERE population_density > 100 ORDER BY crime_rate ASC;
SELECT * FROM HeatMapData WHERE crime_rate BETWEEN 0.1 AND 0.5 ORDER BY population_density DESC;
SELECT region_name, population_density, crime_rate FROM HeatMapData WHERE region_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT AVG(population_density) AS avg_density, SUM(crime_rate) AS total_crime_rate FROM HeatMapData;
SELECT * FROM heat_map_data;
SELECT region_name, population_density FROM heat_map_data ORDER BY population_density DESC;
SELECT region_name, population_density FROM heat_map_data WHERE population_density > 100;
SELECT region_name, crime_type, crime_rate FROM heat_map_data JOIN crime_data ON heat_map_data.region_id = crime_data.region_id;
SELECT region_name, crime_type, crime_rate FROM heat_map_data JOIN crime_data ON heat_map_data.region_id = crime_data.region_id WHERE crime_rate < 0.5;
SELECT region_name, population_density FROM heat_map_data WHERE population_density > 500 ORDER BY population_density DESC
SELECT region_name, crime_type, crime_rate FROM heat_map_data JOIN crime_data ON heat_map_data.region_id = crime_data.region_id WHERE crime_rate > 10 ORDER BY crime_rate ASC
SELECT region_name, population_density FROM heat_map_data WHERE region_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY region_name ASC
SELECT region_id, AVG(crime_rate) AS avg_crime_rate FROM crime_data GROUP BY region_id HAVING AVG(crime_rate) > 5 ORDER BY avg_crime_rate DESC

SELECT region_name, SUM(crime_rate) AS total_crime_rate FROM heat_map_data JOIN crime_data ON heat_map_data.region_id = crime_data.region_id GROUP BY region_name HAVING total_crime_rate > 100 ORDER BY total_crime_rate DESC
SELECT * FROM PopulationDensity;
SELECT region_name, population FROM PopulationDensity WHERE population > 100000;
SELECT region_name, crime_rate FROM CrimeRates ORDER BY crime_rate DESC;
SELECT region_name, population, crime_rate FROM PopulationDensity JOIN CrimeRates ON PopulationDensity.region_id = CrimeRates.region_id;
SELECT * FROM Regions WHERE latitude > 0 AND longitude < 0;
SELECT * FROM PopulationDensity WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT region_name, population FROM PopulationDensity ORDER BY population DESC;
SELECT region_name, crime_rate FROM CrimeRates WHERE crime_rate > 2.5;
SELECT region_name, latitude, longitude FROM Regions WHERE region_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT region_name, population, crime_rate FROM PopulationDensity INNER JOIN CrimeRates ON PopulationDensity.region_id = CrimeRates.region_id;
SELECT * FROM heat_maps;
SELECT region_id, region_name, crime_rate FROM heat_maps WHERE population_density > 1000 ORDER BY region_name DESC;
SELECT region_name, population_density FROM heat_maps WHERE crime_rate < 0.05;
SELECT region_id, region_name, latitude, longitude FROM regions ORDER BY region_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM population_data WHERE year = 2021 AND population_count > 50000;
SELECT region_name, population_density, crime_rate FROM heat_maps
SELECT region_name, latitude, longitude FROM regions
SELECT region_name, population_count FROM population_data WHERE year = 2021
SELECT region_name, year, crime_type, crime_count FROM crime_data WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery'
SELECT * FROM heat_maps JOIN regions ON heat_maps.region_id = regions.region_id
SELECT * FROM region_data;
SELECT region_name, population_density FROM region_data ORDER BY population_density DESC;
SELECT * FROM heat_map_data WHERE map_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM user_data WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT map_id, display_mode FROM map_preferences ORDER BY map_id ASC;
SELECT region_name, population_density FROM region_data WHERE crime_rate > 20 ORDER BY region_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM heat_map_data WHERE map_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM user_data WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT log_id, log_date FROM heatmap_logs WHERE user_id = 1001 AND log_date > '2022-03-01' ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT region_id, AVG(population_density) AS avg_density FROM region_data GROUP BY region_id HAVING AVG(population_density) > 5000;
